reading/viewing: Git stuff (["Happy Git with R"](https://beta.rstudioconnect.com/jennybc/happy-git-with-r/); [GitHub with GitHub desktop](https://jcszamosi.github.io/mcmaster_swc_git_gui/); [GitHub on the command line](https://swcarpentry.github.io/git-novice/)); tidyverse stuff (Software Carpentry lessons on [dplyr](http://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/13-dplyr/) and [tidyr](http://swcarpentry.github.io/r-novice-gapminder/14-tidyr/); [tidyverse cheat sheets](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/) (see especially "data import" and "data transformation"))

topic: infoviz vs data viz; ethics; expository graphics
